bioconda.name: bioconductor-genomicinteractions
bioconda.summary: Utilities for handling genomic interaction data

biotools.summary: R package for handling Genomic interaction data, such as ChIA-PET/Hi-C, annotating genomic features with interaction information and producing various plots/statistics.

bioschemas.name: GenomicInteractions
bioschemas.summary: R package for handling Genomic interaction data, such as ChIA-PET/Hi-C, annotating genomic features with interaction information and producing various plots/statistics.
